game.name: Little Dino Adventure Returns
game.description:
Is exploring interesting and addictive adventure challenges in spare time your hobby? Are you a crazy fan of the extremely popular platform series Mario? If yes, you have come at the right place. We have today brought to you a brand new online game where you have to control a lovely and super fabulous Dino who has returned with an exciting adventure. Will you come again to guide him through multiple levels? Join Little Dino Adventure Returns and be prepared to help a little dinosaur to cross the valley of fear that is full of different obstacles!

Your objective in this HTML5 platform game is to make him jump, run and kill enemies that you see along the way. Make sure to avoid touching the other dinosaur and other obstacles and keep your eyes on collecting the dinosaur eggs. Try to grab all the golden eggs that you see on your path to clear each stage with three stars! There are no chances of getting bored as you have 6 unique and challenging levels to play through.

The designs of this cool jumper are colourful and worth pleasing. You cannot keep your eyes off from the screen for a single second as the gameplay is seamless and controls are very easy to handle. Use the arrow keys along with the X key to play it on your computer or tap the screen if you are exploring it in your mobile phone, tablet, or another gaming device! Good luck to play wisely and clear all six levels with 3 stars in this super fun and challenging 2D game! Check out other free action-adventure challenges and enjoy alone or with your friends, no download required to gain a quick access to them!
